metadata.title: CVE-2022-0977 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Use after free in Browser UI in Google Chrome on Chrome OS prior to99.0.4844.74 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage inspecific user interaction to potentially exploit heap corruption via acrafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
